mapper.select: SELECT s.user_id, s.id, u.name, u.surname, u.email, u.personal_id, s.enrollment FROM users u JOIN students s on u.id = s.user_id and s.id = #{id}
SELECT s.user_id, s.id, u.name, u.surname, u.email, u.personal_id, s.enrollment FROM users u RIGHT JOIN students s on u.id = s.user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users u JOIN students s on u.id = s.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users u JOIN students s on u.id = s.user_id SET u.name = #{student.name}, u.surname = #{student.surname}, u.email = #{student.email}, u.personal_id = #{student.personalId}, s.enrollment = #{student.enrollment} WHERE u.id = #{id}
